title: Sandbox Mode and More bots in customs.

embed.description: Note** Goodness, this blew up quickly. Thanks for the added discussion and for helping draw attention to this everyone. Added a TL:DR to the...

body:
I find it frustrating that I have to spend around 20 - 30 minutes to perform strats and that I have very little control with game im hosting/creating.

Also, when are the new bots coming out in customs? (those include: Jhin, Gangplank, Olaf, Teemo, Volibear, Yasuo, Ahri, Akali, Fizz, Heim, Jinx, Katarina, Nami, Nocturne, Orianna, Pantheon, Riven and Vayne?

I would really appreciate if I can get an answer and if this suggestion is either ignored or rejected, I would a reply of why it is ignored or rejected.

Note: I was told by Riot Support that I have to post my suggestions here.

replies.body:
Hey there,

As far as I'm aware this isn't something that's currently on the table but it is something that Riot would like to do sometime in the future.

Check out [this reply](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2aohc5/until_we_have_a_sandbox_mode_we_will_never_be/cixo00r) from riotBoourns in the reddit thread you linked (excerpt below), i'm sure the same has been said by other Rioters elsewhere before.

>This is something that we've talked about for quite a while on the in game onboarding team and many of us find it to be a very exciting idea. It's something that I would love to work on with a team. It is, unfortunately, not something that we're actively working on right now. I don't know what the future holds, but at the very least this idea is absolutely something that we are aware of and see many of the same positive values you all do. Thanks everyone for your articulate posts.
Vayne bot already gives me theoretical cancer
